contextId.information: Here "fell down" is a euphemism that means they were destroyed." AT: "which destroyed the three horns" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_euphemism]])
contextId.quote: before which the three horns fell down

contextId.information: This is a gentle way of saying "you will die." (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_euphemism]])
